alert.note: Alert for Newton; Orange (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 21 at 10:25AM CST until December 24 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lake Charles LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Sabine River Near Deweyville Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING TO SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sabine River Near Deweyville. * WHEN...From Thursday morning to Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 23.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 24.1 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Sabine River Deweyville 24.0 23.5 Wed 9 am CST 24.0 24.1 23.9 &&
